plot: Rick and Morty venture into Earth-like planet 41-Kepler-B to solve spaghetti problems.

Morty makes the mistake of revealing the secret of the wonderful spaghetti they use to feed their family. As a result, Morty goes to the funeral of the man he had eaten and makes a revelation to the planet he was from. Causing chaos and destruction and basing the entire global economy on people committing suicide and being turned into spaghetti. After all the chaos caused by Morty has been resolved, the post-credits scene shows an alternative reality where everything was caused in a world of vacuum cleaners.—Lucca Onnen

Rick finds this planet where people who commit suicide have their body turned into spaghetti, then he brings it to his house and uses it for spaghetti night. Then Morty finds out, and one thing leads to another where Rick makes a manufacturing plant to make more spaghetti from suicides.
